overview: Clips eroticizes the mystery and fun of lesbian sex. Two young lesbian free spirits, Coco Jo and Houlihan, let their romantic kisses lead them to unusual behavior with a number of scarves. One scarf disappears and.... (Disappears? Where? NO!....oh dear!)  Clips contains three ten minute vignettes. The female ejaculation scene performed by Fanny Fatale is stunning. Her lover, Kenni Mann, is intently watching Wall Street Week on TV. Fanny distracts her by masturbating to a libidinous orgasm, and Kenni responds with a shocking surprise of her own!
title: Clips
